verses.verse: וַיֵּצֵ֞א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze came forth הַגּוֹרָ֤ל <S%H1486><s%> hag-go-Ral lot הַשֵּׁנִי֙ <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni And the second לְשִׁמְע֔וֹן <S%H8095><s%> le-shim-'on, to Simeon לְמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh [even] for the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the children שִׁמְע֖וֹן <S%H8095><s%> shim-'on of Simeon לְמִשְׁפְּחוֹתָ֑ם <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam; according to their families וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become נַֽחֲלָתָ֔ם <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Tam, and their inheritance בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch was within נַחֲלַ֥ת <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lat the inheritance בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi had לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem like בְּנַֽחֲלָתָ֑ם <S%H5159><s%> be-na-cha-la-Tam; And they had in their inheritance בְּאֵֽר־ be-'er- שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H884><s%> She-va' Beersheba וְשֶׁ֖בַע <S%H7652><s%> ve-She-va' or Sheba וּמוֹלָדָֽה׃ <S%H4137><s%> u-mo-la-Dah. and Moladah
וַחֲצַ֥ר va-cha-Tzar שׁוּעָ֛ל <S%H2705><s%> shu-'Al And Hazarshual וּבָלָ֖ה <S%H1088><s%> u-va-Lah and Balah וָעָֽצֶם׃ <S%H6107><s%> va-'A-tzem. and Azem
וְאֶלְתּוֹלַ֥ד <S%H513><s%> ve-'el-to-Lad And Eltolad וּבְת֖וּל <S%H1329><s%> u-ve-Tul and Bethul וְחָרְמָֽה׃ <S%H2767><s%> ve-cha-re-Mah. and Hormah
וְצִֽקְלַ֥ג <S%H6860><s%> ve-tzik-Lag And Ziklag וּבֵית־ u-veit- הַמַּרְכָּב֖וֹת <S%H1024><s%> ham-mar-ka-Vot and Bethmarcaboth וַחֲצַ֥ר va-cha-Tzar סוּסָֽה׃ <S%H2701><s%> su-Sah. and Hazarsusah

וּבֵ֥ית u-Veit לְבָא֖וֹת <S%H1034><s%> le-va-'ot And Bethlebaoth וְשָֽׁרוּחֶ֑ן <S%H8287><s%> ve-sha-ru-Chen; and Sharuhen עָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim cities שְׁלֹשׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> she-losh- three עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh ten וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H2691><s%> ve-chatz-rei-Hen. and their villages

עַ֥יִן׀ <S%H5871><s%> 'A-yin Ain רִמּ֖וֹן <S%H7417><s%> rim-Mon Remmon וָעֶ֣תֶר <S%H6281><s%> va-'E-ter and Ether וְעָשָׁ֑ן <S%H6228><s%> ve-'a-Shan; and Ashan עָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim cities אַרְבַּ֖ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' four וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H2691><s%> ve-chatz-rei-Hen. and their villages

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הַֽחֲצֵרִ֗ים <S%H2691><s%> ha-cha-tze-Rim, And all the villages אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which סְבִיבוֹת֙ <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-Vot that [were] round about הֶֽעָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim these cities הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, these עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far בַּֽעֲלַ֥ת ba-'a-Lat בְּאֵ֖ר <S%H1192><s%> be-'Er to Baalathbeer רָ֣אמַת <S%H7414><s%> Ra-mat Ramath נֶ֑גֶב <S%H5045><s%> Ne-gev; of the south זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> Zot, likewise נַחֲלַ֛ת <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lat This [is] the inheritance מַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the children שִׁמְע֖וֹן <S%H8095><s%> shim-'on of Simeon לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam. according to their families

מֵחֶ֙בֶל֙ <S%H2256><s%> me-Che-vel Out of the portion בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah נַחֲלַ֖ת <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lat [was] the inheritance בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children שִׁמְע֑וֹן <S%H8095><s%> shim-'on; of Simeon כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become חֵ֤לֶק <S%H2506><s%> Che-lek for the part בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah רַ֣ב <S%H7227><s%> rav was too much מֵהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem, of Judah's וַיִּנְחֲל֥וּ <S%H5159><s%> vai-yin-cha-Lu the inheritance בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- for them therefore the children שִׁמְע֖וֹן <S%H8095><s%> shim-'on of Simeon בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch within נַחֲלָתָֽם׃ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Tam. inheritance פ Peh

וַיַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al came up הַגּוֹרָ֣ל <S%H1486><s%> hag-go-Ral lot הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi, And the third לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei for the children זְבוּלֻ֖ן <S%H2074><s%> ze-vu-Lun of Zebulun לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam; according to their families וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul and the border נַחֲלָתָ֖ם <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Tam of their inheritance עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far שָׂרִֽיד׃ <S%H8301><s%> sa-Rid. was unto Sarid

וְעָלָ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> ve-'a-Lah went up גְבוּלָ֧ם׀ <S%H1366><s%> ge-vu-Lam And their border לַיָּ֛מָּה <S%H3220><s%> lai-Yam-mah toward the sea וּמַרְעֲלָ֖ה <S%H4831><s%> u-mar-'a-Lah and Maralah וּפָגַ֣ע <S%H6293><s%> u-fa-Ga' and reached בְּדַבָּ֑שֶׁת <S%H1708><s%> be-dab-Ba-shet; to Dabbasheth וּפָגַע֙ <S%H6293><s%> u-fa-Ga' and reached אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַנַּ֔חַל <S%H5158><s%> han-Na-chal, to the river אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- that פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei that [is] before יָקְנְעָֽם׃ <S%H3362><s%> ya-ke-ne-'Am. Jokneam

וְשָׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> ve-Shav And turned מִשָּׂרִ֗יד <S%H8301><s%> mis-sa-Rid, from Sarid קֵ֚דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> Ke-de-mah eastward מִזְרַ֣ח <S%H4217><s%> miz-Rach east side הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> hash-She-mesh, east side עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- far גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul unto the border כִּסְלֹ֖ת kis-Lot תָּבֹ֑ר <S%H3696><s%> ta-Vor; of Chislothtabor וְיָצָ֥א <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-Tza and then goeth out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַדָּֽבְרַ֖ת <S%H1705><s%> had-da-ve-Rat to Daberath וְעָלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> ve-'a-Lah and goeth up יָפִֽיעַ׃ <S%H3309><s%> ya-Fi-a'. to Japhia

וּמִשָּׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> u-mish-Sham there עָבַר֙ <S%H5674><s%> 'a-Var And from thence passeth on along קֵ֣דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> Ke-de-mah eastward מִזְרָ֔חָה <S%H4217><s%> miz-Ra-chah, the sunrise גִּתָּ֥ה git-Tah חֵ֖פֶר <S%H1662><s%> Che-fer to Gittahhepher עִתָּ֣ה 'it-Tah קָצִ֑ין <S%H6278><s%> ka-Tzin; to Ittahkazin וְיָצָ֛א <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-Tza and goeth out רִמּ֥וֹן <S%H7417><s%> rim-Mon to Remmonmethoar הַמְּתֹאָ֖ר <S%H7417><s%> ham-me-to-'Ar to Rimmon הַנֵּעָֽה׃ <S%H5269><s%> han-ne-'Ah. to Neah

וְנָסַ֤ב <S%H5437><s%> ve-na-Sav compasseth אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> o-To הַגְּב֔וּל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul, And the border מִצְּפ֖וֹן <S%H6828><s%> mitz-tze-Fon it on the north side חַנָּתֹ֑ן <S%H2615><s%> chan-na-Ton; to Hannathon וְהָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become תֹּֽצְאֹתָ֔יו <S%H8444><s%> to-tze-'o-Tav, and the outgoings גֵּ֖י <S%H1516><s%> gei thereof are in the valley יִפְתַּח־ yif-tach- אֵֽל׃ <S%H3317><s%> 'El. of Jiphthahel

וְקַטָּ֤ת <S%H7005><s%> ve-kat-Tat And Kattath וְנַֽהֲלָל֙ <S%H5096><s%> ve-na-ha-Lal and Nahallal וְשִׁמְר֔וֹן <S%H8110><s%> ve-shim-Ron, and Shimron וְיִדְאֲלָ֖ה <S%H3030><s%> ve-yid-'a-Lah and Idalah וּבֵ֣ית u-Veit לָ֑חֶם <S%H1035><s%> La-chem; and Bethlehem עָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim cities שְׁתֵּים־ <S%H8147><s%> she-teim- both עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh ten וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H2691><s%> ve-chatz-rei-Hen. with their villages

זֹ֛את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise נַחֲלַ֥ת <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lat This [is] the inheritance בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children זְבוּלֻ֖ן <S%H2074><s%> ze-vu-Lun of Zebulun לְמִשְׁפְּחוֹתָ֑ם <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam; according to their families הֶֽעָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim these cities הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh these וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H2691><s%> ve-chatz-rei-Hen. with their villages פ Peh

לְיִ֨שָּׂשכָ֔ר <S%H3485><s%> le-Yis-so-sh-Char, to Issachar יָצָ֖א <S%H3318><s%> ya-Tza came out הַגּוֹרָ֣ל <S%H1486><s%> hag-go-Ral lot הָֽרְבִיעִ֑י <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'I; [And] the fourth לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei for the children יִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <S%H3485><s%> yis-so-sh-Char of Issachar לְמִשְׁפְּחוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam. according to their families

וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become גְּבוּלָ֑ם <S%H1366><s%> ge-vu-Lam; And their border יִזְרְעֶ֥אלָה <S%H3157><s%> yiz-re-'E-lah was toward Jezreel וְהַכְּסוּלֹ֖ת <S%H3694><s%> ve-hak-ke-su-Lot and Chesulloth וְשׁוּנֵֽם׃ <S%H7766><s%> ve-shu-Nem. and Shunem
וַחֲפָרַ֥יִם <S%H2663><s%> va-cha-fa-Ra-yim And Hapharaim וְשִׁיאֹ֖ן <S%H7866><s%> ve-shi-'On and Shion וַאֲנָחֲרַֽת׃ <S%H588><s%> va-'a-na-cha-Rat. and Anaharath
וְהָֽרַבִּ֥ית <S%H7245><s%> ve-ha-rab-Bit And Rabbith וְקִשְׁי֖וֹן <S%H7191><s%> ve-kish-Yon and Kishion וָאָֽבֶץ׃ <S%H77><s%> va-'A-vetz. and Abez

וְרֶ֧מֶת <S%H7432><s%> ve-Re-met And Remeth וְעֵין־ ve-'ein- גַּנִּ֛ים <S%H5873><s%> gan-Nim and Engannim וְעֵ֥ין ve-'Ein חַדָּ֖ה <S%H5876><s%> chad-Dah and Enhaddah וּבֵ֥ית u-Veit פַּצֵּֽץ׃ <S%H1048><s%> patz-Tzetz. and Bethpazzez

וּפָגַע֩ <S%H6293><s%> u-fa-Ga' reacheth הַגְּב֨וּל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul And the coast בְּתָב֤וֹר <S%H8396><s%> be-ta-Vor to Tabor; וְשַׁחֲצוּמָה ve-sha-cha-tzu-mah כוְשַׁחֲצִ֙ימָה֙ <S%H7831><s%> ve-sha-cha-Tzi-mah Shahazimah קוּבֵ֣ית u-Veit שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H1053><s%> She-mesh, and Bethshemesh וְהָי֛וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become תֹּצְא֥וֹת <S%H8444><s%> to-tze-'ot and the outgoings גְּבוּלָ֖ם <S%H1366><s%> ge-vu-Lam of their border הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den; were at Jordan עָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim cities שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> shesh- six עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh teen וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H2691><s%> ve-chatz-rei-Hen. with their villages

זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> Zot, likewise נַחֲלַ֛ת <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lat This [is] the inheritance מַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the children יִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <S%H3485><s%> yis-so-sh-Char of Issachar לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam; according to their families הֶעָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim the cities וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H2691><s%> ve-chatz-rei-Hen. and their villages פ Peh

וַיֵּצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze came out הַגּוֹרָ֣ל <S%H1486><s%> hag-go-Ral lot הַֽחֲמִישִׁ֔י <S%H2549><s%> ha-cha-mi-Shi, And the fifth לְמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh for the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the children אָשֵׁ֖ר <S%H836><s%> 'a-Sher of Asher לְמִשְׁפְּחוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam. according to their families

וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become גְּבוּלָ֑ם <S%H1366><s%> ge-vu-Lam; And their border חֶלְקַ֥ת <S%H2520><s%> chel-Kat was Helkath וַחֲלִ֖י <S%H2482><s%> va-cha-Li and Hali וָבֶ֥טֶן <S%H991><s%> va-Ve-ten and Beten וְאַכְשָֽׁף׃ <S%H407><s%> ve-'ach-Shaf. and Achshaph

וְאַֽלַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H487><s%> ve-'a-lam-Me-lech And Alammelech וְעַמְעָ֖ד <S%H6008><s%> ve-'am-'Ad and Amad וּמִשְׁאָ֑ל <S%H4861><s%> u-mish-'Al; and Misheal וּפָגַ֤ע <S%H6293><s%> u-fa-Ga' and reacheth בְּכַרְמֶל֙ <S%H3760><s%> be-char-Mel to Carmel הַיָּ֔מָּה <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam-mah, westward וּבְשִׁיח֖וֹר u-ve-shi-Chor לִבְנָֽת׃ <S%H7884><s%> liv-Nat. and to Shihorlibnath
